text.p: Is [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline] a subset of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^5[/mathjaxinline]?
Is [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline] a subspace of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^5[/mathjaxinline]?

font.p: Elements of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline] are column vectors with 4 entries, whereas elements of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^5[/mathjaxinline] have 5 entries. Thus, an element of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^4[/mathjaxinline] is not an element of [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^5[/mathjaxinline], so [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^5[/mathjaxinline] is not a subset of, and thus not a subspace of, [mathjaxinline]\mathbb R^5[/mathjaxinline].
